input_email_body:
Subject: 

Dear Support Team,

I would like to bring to your attention an issue we are facing with the Scrum board functionality in Jira Software version 8.20 You can reach me at elena.ivanova@support.org.. This situation has become a significant hindrance as we are not able to adequately track our current project assignments My name is Jane Smith.. It is crucial that this issue be addressed immediately, as it could have serious implications for project timelines.

I am reaching out in anticipation that your knowledge and expertise can help us remedy this matter swiftly. If you need additional information, please feel free to reach out to me at <tel_num>.

I look forward to a quick resolution.

Thank you,

<name>
Project Manager, <company_name>
